Desserts.Name: Cassava Cake
Desserts.Description: Cassava cake is a rich, chewy, and cheesy treat that’s impossible to resist.
Desserts.Ingredients: grated cassava, coconut milk, evaporated milk, eggs, butter, cheddar cheese, condensed milk, granulated white sugar

Desserts.name: Leche Flan
Desserts.description: The Filipino version of caramel pudding, leche flan is a traditional dessert served during the holiday season.

Desserts.name: Biko (Sticky Rice Cake)
Desserts.description: Glutinous, or sticky rice, is mixed with a brown rice coconut syrup and baked to perfection.
Desserts.Ingredients: Coconur Milk, Malagkit(sticky rice), Eggs, Sugar

Desserts.name: Ginataang Halo-Halo
Desserts.description: Sweet, thick, and hearty, this soup is sure to turn any frown upside down. It’s Filipino comfort food at its best.
Desserts.Ingredients: sweet potatoes, roots, plantains, jackfruit, tapioca Pearls, glutinous rice balls, white sugar, Coconut Milk

Desserts.name: Buko salad
Desserts.description: Sweet and tender coconut stars this sweet and creamy dessert.
Desserts.Ingredients: fresh coconut shredded, fruit cocktail, nata de coco, all-purpose cream, condensedmilk
